title: Help Translate Pokebattler

meta.description: Pokebattler Translate lets users help us translate the site so everyone can use the World's #1 Most accurate Pokemon Go Simulator.

info: This site is set up to be translated to multiple languages! You can help make the site easier to use for your friends who do not speak English.
how: Translating is done using a web tool called Weblate and can be found at {{link}}. You need to create an account, choose your languages and begin making suggestions for translations. These translations will be reviewed and in general automatically accepted.
rewards: Special rewards normally only available for subscribers are available for translaters who make a significant contribution. This includes more Pokemon for your Pokebox and higher quality custom simulations.
